citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1208 on
15-MAY-19.
Spoke with adult at the residence who stated that no one was available for inspection today.
Additional Inspectors
Moore Mary, Veterinary Medical Officer
